sources.title: Shaolin Soccer (cult ACTION COMEDY full length, comedy films German complete, action film)

metadata.Plot: After a fateful mistake costing his career, an ex-soccer player bum meets a shaolin kung fu student trying to spread the word of kung fu. The ex-soccer player helps reconcile with his five brothers, and teaches them soccer, adding shaolin kung fu as a twist.
metadata.Writer: Stephen Chow, Kan-Cheung Tsang, Min-Hun Fung
metadata.Actors: Stephen Chow, Wei Zhao, Yat-Fei Wong
